jobTitle: Product Marketing Manager Growth, Ring Customer Experience & Engagement Team
description:
The Customer Experience & Engagement (CxE) team is seeking a talented individual with a blend of marketing savvy and product management experience to drive international customer growth strategies. In this role, you will provide guidance and subject matter expertise to partners on how best to communicate with customers. This role will create and manage data driven growth initiatives with a voice of customer focus to help achieve Ring's business goals. You will be responsible for understanding a variety of markets and products offered so you can recommend the best channel (email, push, in-app message, & SMS) to reach customers at the right moment in their purchasing journey. If you enjoy working in a fast-paced environment with good people, developing data driven strategies, and get excited about driving international growth through impactful customer communications, Ring has an opportunity for you. Key job responsibilities
  • Manage audience-specific messaging and communications strategies.
  • Problem-solve proactively to ensure smooth delivery and efficiencies for the CxE deliverables.
  • Influence across teams, roadmaps, priorities and decisions.
  • Track and document project workflow to ensure on-time delivery that aligns with business goals.
  • Measure and evaluate how growth initiatives impact customer experience (e.g., revenue, product/feature adoption, customer journeys, message clarity) and business outcomes
  • Comfortable interacting with all levels of Ring leadership

A day in the life The most exciting part of this role is that each day at Ring offers a new opportunity to meaningfully impact Ring's customers. One day, this role may interact with partners in the UK or Canada to determine the best approach for a new marketing campaign or product introduction. A day later, you might be presenting to marketing, e-comm, product, and CxE leadership on the results of the campaign you just completed. About The Team The CxE team is a blend of marketing, product, creative, and analytic minded customer focused teammates. Our mission is to engage customers at the right moment and in the correct channel to provide an engaging and meaningful customer experience. Whether recommending a new product or helping to keep current products online and working correctly, the CxE team is communicating with Ring's customers every day. Basic Qualifications
  • 3+ years of professional non-internship marketing experience
  • 7+ years of developing and managing marketing or channel programs experience
  • Experience building, executing and scaling cross-functional marketing programs
  • Experience using data and metrics to drive improvements
  • Experience with Excel or Tableau (data manipulation, macros, charts and pivot tables)
  • Experience in online marketing channels such as social media marketing, display advertising, and search engine marketing
  • Experience managing teams

Preferred Qualifications
  • Knowledge of HTML, SQL, Excel
  • Experience with Tableau, SQL, or basic data-mining
  • Experience developing campaigns with a voice of customer (voc) narrative and lens.
